content: I think Abby's character arc was really well done, and I appreciated how the game humanized her and showed her vulnerabilities. I didn't expect to feel sympathetic towards her at first, but as the story progressed, I started to understand her motivations and feel for her. Her relationship with Lev was particularly well-written, and I loved how it added depth to her character. What do you think about the upcoming "Elder Scrolls 6" game? Have you been following any updates or rumors about it?
